column4: I was following instructions to install firesheep and the instructions said to make sure that your xulrunner sdk is in the /usr/lib/xulrunner-1.9.2.12 file. mine is not and i cannot find a xulrunner sdk by searching my file system. how should i proceed
its really hard to follow alal this. if your responding to my question please adress me by my user name
who knows something about xulrunner sdk locations
have u tried a google search with ubuntu and xulrunner as keywords?
